title: Geolocation-Based Attendance Tracker
description: A smart attendance tracking system that uses geolocation to mark attendance automatically. Features real-time tracking, secure authentication, and detailed attendance reports for organizations and educational institutions.
tech: React, Node.js, MongoDB, Google Maps API

title: Credit Card Approval Prediction

title: Farmer Assistant
description: A digital assistant for farmers that provides actionable insights for crop management. Combines soil health analysis, pest alerts, and weather updates to improve productivity and decision-making in agriculture.
